title: Gladius
summaries: The Gladius is a shortsword dropped by Hoplites with a 2.5*1/40 (2.5%) chance. It is one of the strongest shortswords in the game, surpassing the highest pre-Hardmode tier ore-based shortswords (Platinum Shortsword and Gold Shortsword).
Unlike other shortswords, it attacks three times in quick succession per use, with slightly varying angles with each stab.
